老師人很好 考試方式也能真正學習到行銷管理的應用 但報告部分老師的評分標準有時讓人無法理解
是個非常用心，且為學生著想的老師，上課方式也很新穎?期中跟期末都用很特別的方式進行，上完之後真的會對行銷產生興趣。

I enjoy the whole process. All projects are challenging but wonderful and practical lessons for me. But I think having textbook is not necessary. Also, my reading skill is not good enough, so analysis of reading materials is tough for me.

The class and the teaching method is very interesting, I didn't even fall asleep in every class. Professor explained the material thoroughly and effectively and consistently giving several interesting and helpful examples.
老師上課真的很用心也很有趣！
希望可以多一點小組實作，像是期末的TELLA企劃就真的很棒，還可以寫在履歷上。
老師好讚!!!
Steven you are the best !
很棒的老師 教學理念很好
The weekly project is a little bit cumbersome and occupy the professor's teaching time, making the teaching effect become a little poor.The rest of the class is perfect! Thank you, Steven!
Steven is cute and professional. I love every course.
要花不少時間在這堂課上，有時候老師會臨時改動報告時間跟內容，這部分有點小困擾。學期中也會額外增加很多學期初第一堂課根本沒提到的活動跟報告。總之課程大綱是假的，一切按照緣分💞
老師很用心準備教材內容，不過這堂課loading確實很重，課外要花很多時間投入在作業報告中，能學到很多！不過課程review小組報告時，建議老師可以要求報告組事先交簡報檔案給您閱覽，這樣同學報告的時候，老師就不用一直集中在看簡報內容，沒聽清楚同學的報告內容，謝謝您！！！
Professor Steven is so nice, and many classmates like this course very much.

I highly recommend this class! Teacher Steven show his profession to the class and treat us really nice. All the exams and projects are not overloading. You can learn a lot about marketing management.
I think professor Park's teaching style is perfect for this course. I learned a lot and even made some good friends in the class! Thanks a lot!
教授很專業也很用心，也都會尊重學生的意見，是非常棒的一堂課！很有收穫
thank you so much. i learned a lot from you
